original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added documentation for testing custom CodeQL queries, including a new page and sidebar updates.
- Updated Copilot CLI documentation: restructured content, added feature comparison, and customization guides.
- Simplified Copilot agent skills content, removed detailed creation steps, and added CLI/VS Code support notes.
- Extended Copilot hooks with two new types (`agentStop`, `subagentStop`).
- Updated custom agent documentation and tutorials with new terminology and variables.
- Removed Grok model promotional period note from AI model references.
- Added new audit log events for custom image management in GitHub Actions.

### Title
Enhance CodeQL testing docs and restructure Copilot CLI customization
